programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2005/06 season. Jose Mourinho continued his success with Chelsea, Alan Shearer broke Newcastle's scoring record and Harry Redknapp rescued Portsmouth from the drop.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2006/07 season. Ashley Cole began life at Chelsea, Arsene Wenger celebrated his 10th year in charge and West Ham snapped up Carlos Tevez and Javier Mascherano.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2007/08 season. Jose Mourinho's first tenure as Chelsea manager ended, Cristiano Ronaldo topped the scoring charts and Fulham dramatically escaped relegation.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2008/09 season. Manchester City began a new era under new ownership, Manchester United secured a third successive title and Newcastle were dramatically relegated.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2009/10 season. Top scorer Didier Drogba fired Chelsea to the title, Manchester City spent big and Spurs secured Champions League qualification for the first time.

programme.title: Classic Premier League
programme.desc: A review of the 2010/11 season. Man Utd surpassed Liverpool's record of 18 top-flight titles, Man City secured the signing of Yaya Toure and Wolves dramatically avoided relegation.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinals (8-4) line up against the Rockets (8-4) in the Boca Raton Bowl. Toledo won bowl games in two of the last three years, moving to 2-0 at the Boca Raton Bowl by beating Liberty in 2022. The Rockets are riding a four-game win streak.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Hilltoppers and Golden Eagles descend on the Crescent City to compete in the New Orleans Bowl. Western Kentucky has won all four meetings, including 45-28 in the 2015 Conference USA championship game. Southern Miss moved to the Sun Belt in 2022.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Rebels play the Bobcats in the Frisco Bowl. Ohio rides a six-game bowl winning streak, and won this event by shutting out San Diego State in 2018. UNLV had won four in a row prior to its loss at Boise State in the Mountain West title game.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The 2025 Formula One season comes down to a decisive Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. After winning in Qatar, four-time defending World Drivers' Champion Max Verstappen sits 12 points behind Lando Norris. Norris claims his first WDC title with a podium finish.

programme.desc: Philip Rivers is thrust into the national spotlight as his Colts (8-6) host the 49ers (10-4). Rivers, 44, returned from a five-year absence from pro football in Week 15, throwing for 120 yards and touchdown as Indianapolis lost 18-16 at Seattle.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A tip leads Benson and Cragen to the body of a 7-year-old boy, missing since 1980, and the detectives think the new information was a ploy to help the suspected killer, on death row for another murder, delay his execution.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Fin investigate the brutal rape and murder of a prostitute, and the prime suspects turn out to be a group of teens suspected of re-enacting a favorite video game.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives discover that a murdered teenage girl was a prostitute and had contracted HIV while working on a pornographic film, which leads them to her killer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler struggles to keep his emotions in check as he interrogates a man (Matthew Modine) suspected in the murder of a teenage girl -- a man he once let get away on similar charges.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother who reported the statutory rape of her daughter is found murdered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have a suspect (Alfred Molina) but not enough evidence when a serial rapist preys on illegal immigrant women, and Tracy Kibre (Bebe Neuwirth) is brought in to work on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler probe an assault and carjacking, only to find that it is connected to illegal trafficking in painkillers apparently headed by an elderly woman (Melinda Dillon).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a young father is found dead in his home in Jonesboro, Ark., the authorities search for the killer.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Two murders in Toronto ignite an investigation that spans four decades; breakthroughs in investigative genetic genealogy help crack the case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Two murders in Toronto ignite an investigation that spans four decades; breakthroughs in investigative genetic genealogy help crack the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Terrorist leaders are suspected of murdering a retired Army sergeant; Deek connects with a person of interest in the case.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team searches for a missing book containing top-secret information, which belonged to an antiques dealer who was murdered.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Hetty and the team continue searching for an elusive book that has the attention of foreign security agencies.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A child dies in the emergency room after passing out during a prayer vigil at a late-night church service.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to decipher a motive for the strangulation of a Bronx assistant DA in an area where hookers stroll.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claiming to have been the victim of rape commits suicide while she is still in the emergency room.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy senior citizen leads to an investigations that uncovers a serial killer who targets the elderly.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother becomes Stabler and Benson's prime suspect in the poisoning of her child; Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to a wrongful arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A video voyeur catches a sexual assault against a minor on tape, which changes the focus of the investigation as the detectives search for a pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman attempts to kidnap a child she believes is her daughter; while DNA tests are in progress, Benson traces the confusion about the child's origins back to a fertility doctor.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 16-year-old girl is found in a deserted building, she tells the skeptical detectives that three men in uniform kept her there for several days.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler must rely on a psychiatrist (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her schizophrenic patient to find the man behind a number of assaults on the Upper West Side.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While examining a 9-year-old girl after a car crash, doctors find that she has been molested and call in Benson and Stabler, who learn that the girl's attacker has killed another child.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage girl disappears, a psychic (guest star Martin Short) is brought into the investigation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler goes under cover as a sex offender to gain the trust of a serial rapist released from jail, but his cover is blown, putting his life in danger.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A distraught pregnant woman threatens suicide, claiming that her child is a product of rape, but when the case goes to trial, the woman's willingness to settle for cash makes detectives suspicious.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of rapes is linked to a speed-dating service, Benson goes under cover and discovers Mike Jergens (Dean Cain) is the assailant.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a runaway teenage girl is found badly beaten, doctors discover the beating killed her unborn child, and detectives begin to question the father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the near-fatal beating of a 12-year-old boy uncovers a female suspect whose trial becomes about the rights of same-sex parents.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A child dies in the emergency room after passing out during a prayer vigil at a late-night church service.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The search for the sexual abuser of a child leads the detectives to a wealthy toy mogul known for his generous hospitality toward children.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to decipher a motive for the strangulation of a Bronx assistant DA in an area where hookers stroll.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a wealthy senior citizen leads to an investigations that uncovers a serial killer who targets the elderly.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious n

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.
